lead_paragraph: FRANK--Beatrice Silverstein. The Board and staff of Public Art Fund note with deep sadness the death of Bea Frank, wife of Lloyd Frank, founding Board member and one of our dedicated leaders for over 40 years. Our sympathy and deepest condolences to our treasured friend, Lloyd, and his family. Jill Kraus, Chair; Susan K. Freedman, President; and Nicholas Baume, Director 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FRANK, BEATRICE SILVERSTEIN

snippet: FRANK--Beatrice Silverstein. The Board and staff of Public Art Fund note with deep sadness the death of Bea Frank, wife of Lloyd Frank, founding Board member and one of our dedicated leaders for over 40 years. Our sympathy and deepest condolences to our treasured friend, Lloyd, and his family. Jill Kraus, Chair; Susan K. Freedman, President; and Nicholas Baume, Director 1/3
